articles.description: The Newcastle Knights are reportedly furious over Dragons winger Mikaele Ravalawa’s “unsportsmanlike” actions in Sunday’s clash.
articles.content:
Ravalawa collided with Knights five-eighth Kurt Mann, who instantly fell to the ground after his head hit Ravalawas shoulder in the 56th minute.
